檞字的基本解释

檞
jiě
古书上说的一种树木，松樠，即松心木。

檞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiě］
［《廣韻》佳買切，上蟹，見。］
木名。松樠。

檞字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　檞； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页557第14
【唐韻】佳買切，音解。松樠也。與㯽榔、艾蒳皆可合香。　又【集韻】【類篇】?下買切，音蟹。義同。

檞字的起名意思

树名。檞树，木质像松。

檞
Basic explanation of words
檞
jiě
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books, pine quince, that is, pine heart wood.
檞
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [jiě]
["Guang Yun" Jiamai cut, crab, see you. ]
Wooden name. Songxi.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　檞; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 557 14
[Tang Yun] Good buy and cut, phonetic interpretation. Song Xi also. It can be combined with lang and Ailong.　 [Ji Yun] [Class Chapter]? Buy and cut, sound crab. The same meaning.
